entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:28 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 9:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -38.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -42.5°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 5:20 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 5:20 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 38.
